root.name: The Sims 3: Pets
root.description: System RequirementsPC System Requirements:OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7CPU: (XP) 2.0 GHz P4 processor or equivalent; (Vista and Windows 7) 2.4 GHz P4 processor or equivalentRAM: (XP) 1 GB RAM; (Vista and Windows 7) 1.5 GB RAMHARD DRIVE: At least 3.5 GB* of free space with at least 1 GB additional space for custom content and saved games.VIDEO: DirectX 9.0c compatible Video Card with 128 MB of Video RAM and support for Pixel Shader 2.0Mac System Requirements:OS: Mac OS X 10.5.7 Leopard or higherCPU: Intel Core Duo ProcessorRAM: 2 GB RAMHARD DRIVE: At least 3.5 GB* of free space with at least 1 GB additional space for custom content and saved games.VIDEO: ATI x1600 or Nvidia 7300 GT with 128 MB of Video RAM, or Intel Integrated GMA X3100OverviewIn this expansion pack, players of The Sims 3 are given another expansion to their game in which you can create your own; Dog, Cat or a new-comer, known as a Horse*! Unlike The Sims Unleashed or The Sims 2 Pets, The Sims 3 Pets gives players a lot more customization choices to create their desired pet. To suit the expansion, the game comes with a new town called Appaloosa Plains, a town featuring lots suited best for animals.*Horses are only available on the PC/MAC version of the Expansion Pack.
